cyclone.name: CINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 305 mi SSW of the Mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest across the central Gulf of Mexico, then turning north toward the Louisiana coast and moving inland across Louisiana and Arkansas

weather_observation.watch_coast: West of Cameron, Louisiana to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.warning_coast: Cameron, Louisiana to the Mouth of the Pearl River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeast Texas and southwest through southeast Louisiana coasts, extending east to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force gusts (40+ mph) possible Wednesday night into Thursday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of 1–3 ft possible near Sabine Pass/High Island
weather_observation.other_hazards: Low tornado risk in outer rainbands
